maltestestpackage

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Branch, HealingPotion, HeaterShield, Key, LampOil, MiniMap, PlateArmor, PotionOfCourage, PotionOfInvisibility, PotionOfSwiftness, PotionOfTeleportation, PotLid, Sword, TatteredClothes

    public interface Item
    Abstract super class for all item classes getDescription, getName and getType is the same in all item classes and returns a string with description, name or type of said item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      int getStat() 
      java.lang.String getType() 
      void useItem(Player p)
      Executes the unique effect the item in question has.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

      • useItem

        void useItem(Player p)
        Executes the unique effect the item in question has. Weapons, shields and armor doesn't have any use item effect and returns a message "this is not how you use said item".

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns:
        returns the type for comparison in inventory

      • getStat

        int getStat()
        Returns:
        the increase the given item applies or -1 if it's a consumable item
